about_the_game:
A. New Game Mode - Reveal Childhood Memory
Laid in the corner, cobwebbed and dusty,
Who picked up the diary, broke the seal of memory?
Thank you, Mister Carpenter,
Let’s begin, the castle adventure.

B. New Cards - The Seal is Broken
There will be over 70 new cards in the new mode.
Don’t give up! My turn! Draw!!

C. New Monsters - Lives in the Past
You, master of cards, will encounter 27 new enemies such as Portly Devil Castle Phantoms, Sealed Chest, Stitches, Flea Spy in the new adventure.
Some of them felt familiar to the Little Red-Riding Hood...
How did the monsters look like in five years ago?

D. New Events - Brand New Adventure
Over 20 random events are now added to the package. We are going to face more decisions - to be, or not to be?

E. New Scenarios - Mystery Castle
If you are curious about the mysterious castle, you may now explore it with the Little Red-Riding Hood! Castle Lobby, the Kitchen, the Library, the Laboratory, the Dungeon... 8 brand new scenarios reveal the truth of the castle.
